    API Framework

    Framework Speak

    {
    "framework": {
        "speak": "Command Response"
    }
}

    Framework Emote

    
{
    "framework": {
        "emote": "Push Information"
    }
}

    Framework Formatted

    Utilize Slack’s Message Formatting (see doc here)

    Markdown Formatted

    See example output here

    {
    "framework": {
        "formatted": "*bold* `code` _italic_ ~strike~"
    }
}

    Attachment Formatted

    See example output here

    {
    "framework": {
        "attachment": {
            "title": "Title",
            "pretext": "Pretext _supports_ mrkdwn",
            "text": "Testing *right now!*",
            "mrkdwn_in": [
                "text",
                "pretext"
            ]
        }
    }
}
